text: Extreme Rules (2012) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It was held on April 29, 2012 at the Allstate Arena in Rosemont, Illinois. It was the fourth Extreme Rules event held by the WWE. ==Matches== # Matches Stipulations Times Pre-show Santino Marella (c) defeated The Miz Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 4:40 1 Randy Orton defeated Kane Falls Count Anywhere match 16:45 2 Brodus Clay (with Hornswoggle, Cameron and Naomi) defeated Dolph Ziggler (with Vickie Guerrero and Jack Swagger) Singles match 4:17 3 Cody Rhodes defeated Big Show (c) Tables match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 4:37 4 Sheamus (c) defeated Daniel Bryan 2–1 Two out of Three falls match for the World Heavyweight Championship 22:55 5 Ryback defeated Aaron Relic and Jay Hatton Two-on-one handicap match 1:51 6 CM Punk (c) defeated Chris Jericho Chicago Street Fight for the WWE Championship 25:15 7 Layla defeated Nikki Bella (c) (with Brie Bella) Singles match for the WWE Divas Championship 2:45 8 John Cena defeated Brock Lesnar Extreme Rules match 17:43 (c) – refers to the champion(s) heading into the match ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Extreme Rules 2012 website Category:2012 in professional wrestling Category:WWE Extreme Rules Category:2012 in American television Category:2012 in Illinois Category:April 2012 events
title: Extreme Rules (2012)
